commit message: Fix screen orientation change reset issue
Fix screen off issue during timelapse

Enhance connection to camera

Add NFC Handler to pair with camera

Change time between frames to 5sec

Min SDK is now 8
Force wifi ON and fix wifi without ssid issue
Can use other kind of Sony Device
Fix WS connection failed message after switching device
Change package name due to Android keystore lost ....
Fix wifi disconnected when start timelapse

App waits for a Picture to be finished taking (long exposures!) before
the command to take another one is fired. So no shot will be skipped if
the shoot interval is too short.
Add ProgressBar for time to next shot

Long exposure (>10s) fix. Further SDK call needed to wait for correct
'picture done' msg
Add progressBar for currently shooting picture

Keep screen on
(Better solution would be a background service just for taking the
images)
Fix error in german translation that can cause a crash

Add devices to XML supported

Add feature graphic for play-store
CaptureFragment can't be reached by BackButton anymore
Work around for a null pointer exception. It's not the best idea but it works
Add RX100 mk3 to supported devices
